title: Exposed
description: ***Please note â€“ you do NOT need to read Rock Her Curves #1 & #2 to follow books #3 & #4!***EXPOSEDRock Her Curves #3 Thanks to Gunnar ending Down Silent, curvy photographer Lacey Caey finds herself out of a job. To make ends meet, she's now a wedding photographer. As important as those pictures are to capture moments that'll last a lifetime, her need for rock n' roll is too great, and it only grows when she meets the hottest man she's ever met outside a small cafe.Sixx is rock and sex. When Lacey snaps a picture of the lead singer of Sixx Greater, she finds a darker side to the rockstar. A more erotic, commanding, and dominating side...Soon Sixx can't get enough of Lacey's sensual curves and Lacey can't get enough of the rockstar fantasy. But when a job offer comes that can change everything, it means Lacey must walk a fine line between satisfying herself and destroying Sixx.With Lacey's curves and Sixx's music, trouble will be exposed...
author: Karolyn James
